subject: America's Cup
Sailboats and Sailing
Boats and Boating
lead_paragraph: The two-race sweep of the defending champion, Alinghi of Switzerland, returned the oldest trophy in international sports to the United States for the first time in 15 years.
snippet: The two-race sweep of the defending champion, Alinghi of Switzerland, returned the oldest trophy in international sports to the United States for the first time in 15 years.
